meanings.definition: A type of mycotoxin produced by certain fungi.
meanings.sent1: The trichothecene in the moldy bread made people sick.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the effects of trichothecene on human health.
meanings.sent3: The trichothecene at the party was the uninvited guest causing trouble.
meanings.sent4: The trichothecene of fear spread through the town like a dark cloud.
meanings.sent5: The trichothecene lurking in the damp corners of the basement was a silent danger.

meanings.definition: Any of various toxic compounds derived from trichothecene.
meanings.sent1: Exposure to trichothecene compounds can have harmful effects on animals.
meanings.sent2: The lab results showed traces of trichothecene in the samples.
meanings.sent3: The trichothecene in the recipe turned the dish into a disaster.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like trichothecene, poisoning the atmosphere of the room.
meanings.sent5: The trichothecene in the air was a silent threat to their well-being.
